title: Embroidered picture
medium:
Medium: silk, metal wire, metal-wrapped silk, and silk-wrapped metal embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in running and interlaced looping, tent, half cross, and couching stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Fruiting tree with lion at the bottom and bird in the branches. Trunk of the tree is raised. Original picture was probably larger.
name: Embroidered picture
